mapper.select: SELECT a.`id`,a.`begintime`,a.`endtime`,a.`evaluate`,a.`is_valid`,c.`name`,c.`age`,c.`sex`,c.`phone` FROM t_appoint a INNER JOIN t_coach c ON a.c_id=c.id WHERE a.`u_id` = #{userId}
SELECT a.`id`,a.`begintime`,a.`endtime`,a.`evaluate`,a.`is_valid`,u.`name`,u.`sex`,u.`phone` FROM t_appoint a INNER JOIN t_user u ON u.`id`=a.`u_id` WHERE a.`c_id`=#{coachId}
